Unveiling of New Branding for Badger Meter Flow Instrumentation
When
Friday, April 25 at 10:30 a.m. CST
Presenter
Judson Luke, Integrated Marketing Services Manager, will be presenting a 20 minute, quick-hitting webinar presentation to explain the logic behind the launch of Badger Meter Flow Instrumentation.
Topic
We have some exciting news to share with you regarding a re-branding effort for the Badger Meter flow instrumentation (formerly "Industrial") products.
Highlights:
Differentiates our brand from competition Enables new cross-selling opportunities Unifies our global product offering Refined global message
The new Flow Instrumentation name reflects broad solutions for the global industrial and commercial markets, which help keep plant processes and precision-based operations efficient, profitable and safe. In recent years, our solution offering has expanded through product development and acquisitions. The re-branding will help differentiate Badger Meter products from competitive offerings. It also strengthens the cohesiveness among all Badger Meter flow instrumentation products, enabling more opportunities for cross-selling into new applications.
To register for the webinar:
1. Click on the button above or go to https://badgermeter-events.webex.com/badgermeter-events/onstage/g.php?d=660151293&t=a 2. Click "Register". 3. On the registration form, enter your information and then click "Submit".
Once we approve your registration, you will receive a confirmation email message with instructions on how to join the event.
As always, we welcome your input. Please feel free to contact us with any comments or suggestions you may have.
